DOC.brief_summary: To gather data indicate whether OrthoAccel device speed tooth movement people use orthodontics ( brace ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Cyclic Loading ( Vibration ) Orthodontic Tooth Movement
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , blind study follow 32 patient six month . Patients minimum 3 mm extraction space need close move anterior teeth canine distally . Patients standard orthodontic treatment temporary anchorage device tooth movement space closure . Half patient receive function device half patient receive sham-device . Patients use device 20 minute daily ; device mouthpiece patient lightly bite plus connected enclosure stay outside mouth . The enclosure provide light vibration .
DOC.criteria: Permanent dentition age 12 40 Minimum 3 mm extraction space close distal movement 6 anterior teeth canine canine distal movement canine Good oral hygiene compliance Any compromise medical dental condition Patient currently involve study Lives significantly outside San Antonio , TX use bisphosphonates pregnant female
